environment.culture_values: Motto: 'Willen is kunnen' (willing is being able). A challenging school that believes in student potential and growth. Creates a mini-society learning environment preparing students for their futures beyond academics. Emphasizes resilience and adaptability for a changing world.

public_transport.accessibility_info: metro 53 halte Ganzenhoef, bus 41, 47 en 66 halte Tulastraat

open_days.note: Everyone is warmly welcome, also without registration
Everyone is warmly welcome, also without registration

admission_info: Voorrangsregels: voorrang voor broertjes en/of  zusjes van zittende leerlingen die op 1 oktober 2016 ingeschreven stonden, voorrang voor kinderen van personeelsleden die op 1 oktober 2016 in dienst van het schoolbestuur waren
Toelating: school streeft naar evenwichtige verdeling adviezen per klas; in bijzondere gevallen overleg over geschiktheid voor onderwijs in heterogene groep

strengths: All three educational tracks (VMBO, HAVO, VWO) under one roof
Strong focus on practical experience and workplace exposure
OSB Extra enrichment program with sport, arts, culture, and music
Customized learning paths with elective subjects
Located in Bijlmer with good metro and train connections
Emphasis on developing resilience and adaptability
Welcoming atmosphere - open days without registration required
considerations: Located in Bijlmer - significant commute from Amstelveen
Limited publicly available information about specific facilities and contact details
Distance may impact participation in after-school activities
best_fit_for: Students who benefit from practical, real-world learning experiences
Students interested in early career exploration
Families seeking comprehensive educational options (VMBO through VWO)
Students who thrive in diverse, inclusive environments
Students interested in arts, culture, music, and sports programs
Students who want customized learning paths with enrichment opportunities
ai_analysis.summary: Open Schoolgemeenschap Bijlmer (OSB) is a challenging public school in Amsterdam Bijlmer offering VMBO, HAVO, and VWO education with a unique 'Willen is kunnen' (willing is being able) motto. The school creates a mini-society learning environment with strong emphasis on practical experience, workplace exposure, and early career exploration. Through its OSB Extra program, students can engage in sport, arts, culture, and music while following customized learning paths. OSB prepares students not just academically but for resilience and adaptability in a changing world.
